subNodes.conversationText: root
There is nothing left but a deserted campsite, the embers of a fire still burning low. It appears the band of goblins have now vanished, with no other trace.
Well what do you know, they buggered off.

You find a band of goblins here busying themselves in the construction of a make-shift camp. One larger than the others goes about giving orders. They are content to ignore you, but consistently defer to their leader who they call Rorn the Black.
Just watch yourself and don't try to pull anything. Carry on.
On second thought, you goblins are threat that will have to be eliminated sooner or later. Prepare for battle!
I have heard that name, Rorn the Black. We were informed you stole some bard instruments.
Crashing through the forest path, a brutish goblinoid creature with a sloped brow leads a band of others in its wake. An open mouth filled with crooked teeth snarls a bellicose challenge.
Continue.
Out of the way!
I beg your pardon, but who are you to order me about?
I am Rorn the Black. And we are on important merchant business, looking to make camp as we pass through this wood. If you just step aside, we can settle down in this spot. Not wanting any trouble.
Well, if your intentions are peaceful, then carry on. But we will keep an eye on you.

We are not staying long. A short rest before moving on to our next destination. Do not mistake us for having anything to do with the Daggerford Goblins. I am involved with more freelance work, offering services for the right price. Our paths need not cross each other.
Then let us part company without bloodshed. Farewell.
You know what, I don't like the sound of that. I've got more questions for you.
Enough talk. You have tested my patience far enough. And now you will understand why I am called Rorn the Black!
Goblins Attack!
I am not comfortable with goblins living so close to the Castle.

Do not think we are the same as the Daggerford Goblins. And we are not wanting to settle near the Castle, if that is your concern. I travel between towns and villages, offering services for a price. This is just a short stop along the way.
Fair enough. We will go our separate ways. Farewell.
Any goblin roaming about is a threat, I say. You'll go no further.
I have heard that name, Rorn the Black. We were informed you stole some bard instruments.
Stolen instruments… is that what she told you? The woman can spin a fine tale. I'll have you know, these instruments belong to me.
You... play musical instruments?
Maybe I do! Maybe I can sing like an angel. All that matters is that these instruments are my property. If you don't believe me, go back to that bard and tell her what I said.
It seems there are two sides to this coin. Very well, we will return after speaking to Lady Madrigal.
I have heard enough. Hand over those instruments, scoundrel, else we shall take them by force.
I don't believe you.
And I don't care if you doubt my claim. But you are being manipulated by that bard, just like she does to everyone else. Go ahead, confront her with this information. We will wait here.
It seems there are two sides to this coin. Very well, we will return after speaking to Lady Madrigal.
I have heard enough. Hand over those instruments, scoundrel, else we shall take them by force.
You can walk around us, I’m not moving.
Look, we are only trying to set up camp! Have we done anything to disturb you? This would make a fine location. Now best be on your way, else you will learn why I am called Rorn the Black.
Well, if your intentions are peaceful, then carry on. But we will keep an eye on you.
Are you threatening me?

What is wrong with you people! Do you think every goblin you meet is from the Daggerford tribe? We have no quarrel with the Kingdom. It might interest you to learn that I have had dealings with merchants from the Castle. So i'm just saying, you had best watch your backs.
Then let us part company without bloodshed. Farewell.
You know what, I don't like the sound of that. I've got more questions for you.
Enough talk. You have tested my patience far enough. And now you will understand why I am called Rorn the Black!
I have heard that name, Rorn the Black. We were informed you stole some bard instruments.
What’s going on here?

The only thing that’s not going on here is us setting up our camp. I am Rorn... Rorn the Black, and we travel to take care of some business matters. The sooner you get your nose out of our business, the better.
Well, if your intentions are peaceful, then carry on. But we will keep an eye on you.
Is that a threat?

What is wrong with you people! Do you think every goblin you meet is from the Daggerford tribe? We have no quarrel with the Kingdom. It might interest you to learn that I have had dealings with merchants from the Castle. So i'm just saying, you had best watch your backs.
I have heard that name, Rorn the Black. We were informed you stole some bard instruments.
